property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: The runtime framework for executing MapReduce jobs. Can be one of local, classic or yarn. Default: local

property.name: mapreduce.job.heap.memory-mb.ratio
property.description: The ratio of heap-size to container-size. If no -Xmx is specified, it is calculated as (mapreduce.{map|reduce}.memory.mb * mapreduce.heap.memory-mb.ratio). If -Xmx is specified but not mapreduce.{map|reduce}.memory.mb, it is calculated as (heapSize / mapreduce.heap.memory-mb.ratio). Default: 0.8

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
property.description: The total amount of buffer memory to use while sorting files, in megabytes. By default, gives each merge stream 1MB, which should minimize seeks. Default: 100

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
property.description: The number of streams to merge at once while sorting files. This determines the number of open file handles. Default: 10

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.parallelcopies
property.description: The default number of parallel transfers run by reduce during the copy(shuffle) phase. Default: 5

property.name: mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress
property.description: Should the job outputs be compressed? Default: false

property.name: mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress
property.description: Should the job outputs be compressed? Default: false

property.name: mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress.type
property.description: If the job outputs are to compressed as SequenceFiles, how should they be compressed? Should be one of NONE, RECORD or BLOCK. Default: RECORD

property.name: mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.compress.codec
property.description: If the job outputs are compressed, how should they be compressed? Default: org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.DefaultCodec

property.name: mapreduce.map.memory.mb
property.description: The amount of memory to request from the scheduler for each map task. If this is not specified or is non-positive, it is inferred from mapreduce.map.java.opts and mapreduce.job.heap.memory-mb.ratio. If java-opts are also not specified, we set it to 1024. Default: -1

property.name: mapreduce.map.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores to request from the scheduler for each map task. Default: 1

property.name: mapreduce.map.java.opts
property.description: Java opts for the task processes. The following symbol, if present, will be interpolated: @taskid@ is replaced by current TaskID. Any other occurrences of '@' will go unchanged. For example, to enable verbose gc logging to a file named for the taskid in /tmp and to set the heap maximum to be a gigabyte, pass a 'value' of: -Xmx1024m -verbose:gc -Xloggc:/tmp/@taskid@.gc Usage of -Djava.library.path can cause programs to no longer function if hadoop native libraries are used. These values should instead be set as part of LD_LIBRARY_PATH in the map / reduce JVM env using the mapreduce.map.env and mapreduce.reduce.env config settings. If -Xmx is not set, it is inferred from mapreduce.{map|reduce}.memory.mb and mapreduce.job.heap.memory-mb.ratio.

property.name: mapreduce.map.output.compress
property.description: Should the outputs of the maps be compressed before being sent across the network. Uses SequenceFile compression. Default: false

property.name: mapreduce.map.output.compress.codec
property.description: If the map outputs are compressed, how should they be compressed? Default: org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.DefaultCodec

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.cpu.vcores
property.description: The number of virtual cores to request from the scheduler for each reduce task. Default: 1

property.name: mapreduce.job.emit-timeline-data
property.description: Specifies if the Application Master should emit timeline data to the timeline server. Individual jobs can override this value. Default: false
